package Logic_Test_5;

public class Que1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
//		Q.1) Store 2 string in an array eg. [“Car”, “Truck”,] 
//				Write a statement having words Car and Truck. Count occurrence of Car 
//				and Truck in given paragraph.   
//				Eg. Input  
//				I have 2 Car one is Baleno Car and other is Farari Car but Truck is used for 
//				transportation. 
//				Car occurred 3 time Truck Occurred 1 time 
		
		String arr [] = {"Car", "Truck"};
		
		String input = "I have 2 Car one is Baleno Car and other is Farari Car but Truck is used for "
				+ "transportation";
		
		for(String word : arr) {
			
			int index = 0;
			int count=0;
			
			while ((index = input.indexOf(word, index)) != -1) {
			    count++;
			    index += word.length();
			}
				
			System.out.println(word +" occurred "+count+" times");
		}
			

	}

}


package Logic_Test_5;

public class Que2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

//		Q.2) Accept a sentence , accept a word and count occurrence of that word. 
//	Input: Wel come to  CDAC it offers DAC in All CDAC centre. 
//	Input DAC 
//	O/P DAC occurred 3 time 
		
		String sentence = "Wel come to  CDAC it offers DAC in All CDAC centre.";
		sentence = sentence.toLowerCase();
		String input = "DAC";
		input = input.toLowerCase();
		
		int count =0;
		int index =0;
		
		while((index = sentence.indexOf(input, index)) != -1) {
			count++;
			index= index+input.length();
		}
		
		System.out.println(input+" occured "+count+" times");
	}

}

package Logic_Test_5;

import day3.arraydemo;

public class Que3 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
//		Q.3) Accept a name from user and check if it is palindrome or not 
		
		String name = "namai";
		char ch [] = name.toCharArray();
		int l = name.length();
		
		boolean flag = true;
		for(int i=0; i<name.length()/2; i++) {
			if(ch[i] != ch[l-1-i]) {
				System.out.println("Given string is not a palindrome");
				flag = false;
			}
		}
		
		if(flag==true) {
			System.out.println("Palindrome");
		}
		

	}

}
